bug.description:
Describe the bug Can't product report
Following the example in the docs <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2425141/60698040-1913ab00-9f20-11e9-9eab-82f87617d2c8.png></denchmark-link>
Version information: pandas-profiling is installed via conda Additional context Add any other context about the problem here.

comments.comment: Have a look at [<denchmark-link:https://github.com/pandas-profiling/pandas-profiling/issues/196>#196</denchmark-link> ]. The pull request that updates conda-forge to version 2 is <denchmark-link:https://github.com/conda-forge/pandas-profiling-feedstock/pulls>pending</denchmark-link> . Install via for now.
